General.Name: Barunson Co. Ltd
General.Description: Barunson Co., Ltd. creates, distributes, and invests in cultural contents in South Korea. The company produces and publishes movies, images, dramas, and games using VR technology. It also operates JOLSE, a beauty platform that connects the K-BEAUTY brands to the consumers. Barunson Co., Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is headquartered in Suwon-si, South Korea.
